If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by the chic, flirty Los Angeles lifestyle, Lovers + Friends apparel is made for the girl with an eye for laid-back fashion. Offering the perfect balance of day-to-night pieces in bold, sexy silhouettes, Lovers + Friends dresses and tops manage a delightful blend of trend-focused ideas and unique execution. The label gives every new season a fresh eye and distinctive aesthetic, bringing ease to forward fashion and giving Lovers + Friends clothing the edge on effortless style.
